original: 寶星陀羅尼經卷第九
analyzed: 寶星陀羅尼經卷第九
translated: Precious Star Dhāraṇī Sūtra, Scroll 9

original: 唐天竺三藏波羅頗蜜多羅譯
analyzed: 唐天竺三藏波羅頗蜜多羅譯
translated: Translated by Tripiṭaka Master Prabhamitra of India during the Tang Dynasty

original: 擁護品之餘
analyzed: 擁護品之餘
translated: The Remainder of the Chapter on Protection

original: 「唯置作五逆者、誹謗正法者、謗無賢聖者，身口意業所作之惡業及果報，一切皆滅。
analyzed: 「唯置作五逆者、誹謗正法者、謗無賢聖者，身口意業所作之惡業及果報，一切皆滅。
translated: Only those who commit the five heinous crimes, slander the true Dharma, and slander those without sages, their evil karmic actions and their fruits of retribution will all be extinguished.

original: 若此法門乃至經卷，若但書持置於宅中，彼等所有諸業煩惱，能為障礙量等須彌，皆悉消滅。
analyzed: 若此法門乃至經卷，若但書持置於宅中，彼等所有諸業煩惱，能為障礙量等須彌，皆悉消滅。
translated: If this Dharma gate and even the sūtra are written down and placed in the house, all their afflictions and karmic hindrances, as vast as Mount Sumeru, will all be eliminated.

original: 一切善根悉得增長，一切善分皆悉滿足，意所悕望皆悉成就，身口意善悉當增長。
analyzed: 一切善根悉得增長，一切善分皆悉滿足，意所悕望皆悉成就，身口意善悉當增長。
translated: All their wholesome roots will increase and flourish, all their wholesome qualities will be fully perfected, all their aspirations will be fulfilled, and all their wholesome actions of body, speech, and mind will flourish.

original: 一切惡見斷滅無餘，一切怨敵以法調伏。
analyzed: 一切惡見斷滅無餘，一切怨敵以法調伏。
translated: All their evil views will be eradicated without remainder, and all their enemies will be subdued through the Dharma.

original: 一切微細寂滅之道悉當得入，以此一切諸佛世尊所共護持大集陀羅尼法門加護力故。
analyzed: 一切微細寂滅之道悉當得入，以此一切諸佛世尊所共護持大集陀羅尼法門加護力故。
translated: All subtle and tranquil paths will be entered, by the power of the protection and upholding of this great collection dhāraṇī Dharma door, which is held in common by all the buddhas, world-honored ones.

original: 「隨所有國此陀羅尼法門當流行地，能令彼地肥膩精味倍上成就，美果妙味當得增長，苦辛惡味當得遠離，華果財穀色類成就，倉庫貯器悉皆增滿，衣服飲食湯藥所用倍勝增多，由法力故。
analyzed: 「隨所有國此陀羅尼法門當流行地，能令彼地肥膩精味倍上成就，美果妙味當得增長，苦辛惡味當得遠離，華果財穀色類成就，倉庫貯器悉皆增滿，衣服飲食湯藥所用倍勝增多，由法力故。
translated: In whatever country this dhāraṇī Dharma door is practiced, it will cause the land to be twice as fertile and productive, with beautiful fruits and wonderful flavors increasing and growing, and bitter and foul flavors being eliminated. The colors and forms of flowers, fruits, wealth, and grain will be perfected, and the storage vessels will all be filled to the brim. By the power of the Dharma, the use of clothing, food, medicine, and tonics will be twice as excellent and abundant.

original: 「若有眾生受彼飲食者，當得無病顏色成就，氣力強健憶念堅固，樂求善法遠離諸惡。
analyzed: 「若有眾生受彼飲食者，當得無病顏色成就，氣力強健憶念堅固，樂求善法遠離諸惡。
translated: If sentient beings receive that food and drink, they will become free from illness, have a perfect complexion, be strong and healthy, have firm memory and recollection, delight in seeking good dharmas, and be free from all evil.

original: 彼諸眾生若命終已，當生汝等種類之中，眷屬增長勢力具足怨不能壞，以法力故，當得四姓之所擁護，當以法義共相示誨。
analyzed: 彼諸眾生若命終已，當生汝等種類之中，眷屬增長勢力具足怨不能壞，以法力故，當得四姓之所擁護，當以法義共相示誨。
translated: When those sentient beings die, they will be reborn among your kind, increasing your family and increasing your power and strength, so that your enemies will not be able to destroy you. By the power of the Dharma, you will be protected by the four castes, and you will mutually instruct each other with the meaning of the Dharma.

original: 汝等若能如是作者，即為供養一切三世諸佛世尊已。
analyzed: 汝等若能如是作者，即為供養一切三世諸佛世尊已。
translated: If you are able to do this, then you will have made offerings to all the Buddhas, the World-Honored Ones, of the three times.

original: 」爾時，曼陀香如來即依諸佛清淨境界智慧音聲隨類句義，以一切諸佛世尊語悉滿此剎，遍告此佛剎中一切諸菩薩摩訶薩，及釋主、梵主、摩呼羅伽主所有居此佛剎者，倍復加勸此四天下中所居住者：
analyzed: 」爾時，曼陀香如來即依諸佛清淨境界智慧音聲隨類句義，以一切諸佛世尊語悉滿此剎，遍告此佛剎中一切諸菩薩摩訶薩，及釋主、梵主、摩呼羅伽主所有居此佛剎者，倍復加勸此四天下中所居住者：
translated: At that time, the Tathāgata Mandārava Fragrance, relying on the pure realm of the wisdom and voice of the Buddhas, and using the meaning of the phrases that accord with the various kinds, with the speech of all the Buddhas, the World-Honored Ones, completely filling this realm, universally announced to all the Bodhisattva Mahāsattvas in this Buddha realm, as well as the lords of the Śakras, the lords of the Brahmās, and the lords of the Mahoragas who dwell in this Buddha realm, and further encouraged those who dwell in this four-continent world:

original: 「汝等應當住持開示此諸佛語大集法門，擁護此經微妙正法。
analyzed: 「汝等應當住持開示此諸佛語大集法門，擁護此經微妙正法。
translated: You should uphold and reveal this great assembly Dharma door, the words of the Buddhas, and protect this subtle and correct Dharma of the sūtra.

original: 」爾時，眾中九萬七千俱胝得忍諸菩薩摩訶薩，彌勒為首，居此佛剎者，一切同聲作如是言：
analyzed: 」爾時，眾中九萬七千俱胝得忍諸菩薩摩訶薩，彌勒為首，居此佛剎者，一切同聲作如是言：
translated: At that time, the 97 trillion bodhisattva-mahāsattvas who had attained acceptance, headed by Maitreya, who were dwelling in this buddha-land, all spoke in unison, saying:

original: 「我等今者奉諸佛教，為欲供養一切三世諸如來故，於此一切諸佛世尊微妙法門，恭敬頂戴尊重如佛，悲愍成熟諸眾生故，乃至安置無上道故。
analyzed: 「我等今者奉諸佛教，為欲供養一切三世諸如來故，於此一切諸佛世尊微妙法門，恭敬頂戴尊重如佛，悲愍成熟諸眾生故，乃至安置無上道故。
translated: We now respectfully accept the teachings of all the buddhas, in order to make offerings to all the tathāgatas of the three times, and in order to respectfully uphold, venerate, and treat as the Buddha this subtle Dharma door of all the world-honored buddhas, out of compassion and to bring sentient beings to maturity, up to establishing them in the unsurpassed path.

original: 「我等於諸聚落城邑州縣國土王宮諸寂靜處，以此法門廣布顯示，為欲成熟諸眾生故，令此妙法得久住故。
analyzed: 「我等於諸聚落城邑州縣國土王宮諸寂靜處，以此法門廣布顯示，為欲成熟諸眾生故，令此妙法得久住故。
translated: We will in all the villages, towns, prefectures, countries, palaces, and places of tranquility, widely disseminate and reveal this Dharma door in order to bring sentient beings to maturity and cause this subtle Dharma to long endure.

original: 」爾時，一切諸佛世尊來此剎者，咸作是言：
analyzed: 」爾時，一切諸佛世尊來此剎者，咸作是言：
translated: At that time, all the buddhas who had come to this realm universally said:

original: 「善哉，善哉！
analyzed: 「善哉，善哉！
translated: Excellent, excellent!

original: 汝等如是作所應作。
analyzed: 汝等如是作所應作。
translated: You should do what you should do.

original: 」是時，一切釋梵摩呼羅伽主等居此土者，并餘來眾六十四俱胝那由他等大精味中有大威德眾生，一切同聲，作如是言：
analyzed: 」是時，一切釋梵摩呼羅伽主等居此土者，并餘來眾六十四俱胝那由他等大精味中有大威德眾生，一切同聲，作如是言：
translated: At that time, all the lords of Śakra, Brahmā, and the mahoragas dwelling in this land, as well as the other assembled multitudes of 64 koṭīs of nayutas, the great beings with great authority and virtue, all spoke in the same voice, saying:

original: 「我等於此微妙大集法門悉當受持，乃至廣為開示顯說，成熟眾生故，妙法久住故，樂法聽法者悉當擁護。
analyzed: 「我等於此微妙大集法門悉當受持，乃至廣為開示顯說，成熟眾生故，妙法久住故，樂法聽法者悉當擁護。
translated: We will all uphold this subtle and great Dharma assembly, and extensively reveal and explain it for the sake of maturing sentient beings, for the sake of the wonderful Dharma abiding for a long time, and for the sake of protecting those who delight in the Dharma and listen to the Dharma.

original: 「我等今者，奉諸佛教，隨此法門流行之處，令使一切鬪諍違背，謀計諍論，飢儉荒亂，他方怨敵，非時風雨，非時寒熱，苦辛澁味，惡人惡物悉當消滅。
analyzed: 「我等今者，奉諸佛教，隨此法門流行之處，令使一切鬪諍違背，謀計諍論，飢儉荒亂，他方怨敵，非時風雨，非時寒熱，苦辛澁味，惡人惡物悉當消滅。
translated: We now respectfully accept the teachings of all the Buddhas. Wherever this Dharma gate spreads, we will cause all disputes, disagreements, schemes, arguments, famine, chaos, foreign enemies, untimely wind and rain, untimely cold and heat, bitter, astringent, and rough flavors, evil people, and evil things to be eliminated.

original: 安隱快樂豐饒和合，悉當成就此妙正法當令久住，倍加勤勇擁護供給正法國王，及以勤修禪定眾生悉當擁護。
analyzed: 安隱快樂豐饒和合，悉當成就此妙正法當令久住，倍加勤勇擁護供給正法國王，及以勤修禪定眾生悉當擁護。
translated: peaceful, happy, prosperous, and harmonious, will all accomplish this wonderful true Dharma and make it endure for a long time. They will redouble their diligence in protecting and supporting the righteous Dharma king, and will protect all sentient beings who diligently cultivate meditative concentration.

original: 」時，彼一切諸佛世尊同聲讚言：
analyzed: 」時，彼一切諸佛世尊同聲讚言：
translated: At that time, all those Buddha Bhagavans spoke in unison, praising:

original: 「善哉，善哉！
analyzed: 「善哉，善哉！
translated: Excellent, excellent!

original: 善男子！
analyzed: 善男子！
translated: Good men!

original: 汝等今者應如是作，勤作自他利益之事，即於一切三世諸佛為供養已。
analyzed: 汝等今者應如是作，勤作自他利益之事，即於一切三世諸佛為供養已。
translated: You should act like this now, diligently working for the benefit of yourselves and others, and you will have made offerings to all Buddhas of the three times.

original: 如汝等勤勞成熟諸眾生故，令此妙法得久住故，汝等皆當速得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 如汝等勤勞成熟諸眾生故，令此妙法得久住故，汝等皆當速得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: Because you diligently mature all sentient beings and cause this wonderful Dharma to endure for a long time, you will all quickly attain supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: 」爾時，中四天下釋梵天主，乃至摩呼羅伽主，及大威德中最上首者，一切悉皆從坐而起，恭敬合掌，作如是言：
analyzed: 」爾時，中四天下釋梵天主，乃至摩呼羅伽主，及大威德中最上首者，一切悉皆從坐而起，恭敬合掌，作如是言：
translated: At that time, the lords of Śakra, Brahmā, and the gods in the four continents below, up to the lords of the mahoragas, and the foremost among those with great authority, all rose from their seats, respectfully joined their palms, and said this:

original: 「我等亦奉一切諸佛世尊教故，悉共光顯此妙正法擁護住持，及此大集一切諸佛所護陀羅尼印法門，當如法受。
analyzed: 「我等亦奉一切諸佛世尊教故，悉共光顯此妙正法擁護住持，及此大集一切諸佛所護陀羅尼印法門，當如法受。
translated: We also, in obedience to the teachings of all the World-Honored Buddhas, will together glorify this sublime true Dharma, protect and uphold it, as well as this great assembly of all Buddhas' guarded dhāraṇī seal Dharma door, and will receive it according to the Dharma.

original: 「乃至於諸聚落、城邑、州縣、國土、王宮諸寂靜處，當廣開示，持妙法人擁護供給。
analyzed: 「乃至於諸聚落、城邑、州縣、國土、王宮諸寂靜處，當廣開示，持妙法人擁護供給。
translated: Up to the villages, towns, counties, countries, and palaces, in all tranquil places, we will widely expound it, and the upholders of the sublime Dharma will be protected and provided for.

original: 所有住信正法法師及聽法者，比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，善男子、善女人信受此法，乃至若但書寫經卷置之家中，勤修禪定，我等於彼擁護供給種種供養，衣服飲食、華蓋幢幡、塗香末香，乃至一切醫藥資具，諸有所須善作供給。
analyzed: 所有住信正法法師及聽法者，比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，善男子、善女人信受此法，乃至若但書寫經卷置之家中，勤修禪定，我等於彼擁護供給種種供養，衣服飲食、華蓋幢幡、塗香末香，乃至一切醫藥資具，諸有所須善作供給。
translated: As for the Dharma teachers and Dharma listeners who abide in faith in the true Dharma, the bhikṣus, bhikṣuṇīs, upāsakas, upāsikās, good men and good women who accept this Dharma, up to those who merely copy the sūtra and place it in their homes, diligently cultivating meditative concentration, we will protect and provide for them, making various offerings of clothing, food and drink, flowers, canopies, banners, ointments, powdered incense, up to all medical supplies and necessities, and will diligently provide for their needs.

original: 「若人能於此妙法門，誦時讀時開示說時，我等自往彼法座所，為聽法故如大師想，於此法門恭敬尊重一心讚歎，諸蓋幢幡持以供養。
analyzed: 「若人能於此妙法門，誦時讀時開示說時，我等自往彼法座所，為聽法故如大師想，於此法門恭敬尊重一心讚歎，諸蓋幢幡持以供養。
translated: If someone is able to recite, read, and explain this wonderful Dharma door, we will go to that Dharma seat ourselves, in order to listen to the Dharma, thinking of it as the great teacher. We will respectfully honor and wholeheartedly praise this Dharma door, and with canopies, banners, and flags, we will make offerings to it.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is this?

original: 我等於此一切諸佛之所擁護陀羅尼法門廣開示時，以法味故當得精氣，具足力，具足精進，具足志，具足念，具足智，具足善友，具足眷屬，具足所有軍眾，怨不能壞。
analyzed: 我等於此一切諸佛之所擁護陀羅尼法門廣開示時，以法味故當得精氣，具足力，具足精進，具足志，具足念，具足智，具足善友，具足眷屬，具足所有軍眾，怨不能壞。
translated: Because when we widely expound this Dharma door of the dhāraṇī that is protected by all the buddhas, we will obtain vital energy due to the taste of the Dharma, be endowed with power, endowed with vigor, endowed with determination, endowed with mindfulness, endowed with wisdom, endowed with good friends, endowed with retinue, and endowed with all the troops that cannot be destroyed by enemies.

original: 是故我等令一切國界所有鬪諍謀計言訟，飢儉疾病他方怨賊，非時風雨極寒極熱災旱愆時，惡夢惡相麁澁無膩苦辛惡味，惡人、惡物諸不善分悉當消滅，倍復安隱豐熟喜樂，無病和合悉當成就。
analyzed: 是故我等令一切國界所有鬪諍謀計言訟，飢儉疾病他方怨賊，非時風雨極寒極熱災旱愆時，惡夢惡相麁澁無膩苦辛惡味，惡人、惡物諸不善分悉當消滅，倍復安隱豐熟喜樂，無病和合悉當成就。
translated: Therefore, we will cause all the countries to have no disputes, schemes, arguments, famine, disease, foreign enemies, untimely wind and rain, extreme cold and heat, drought, bad dreams, bad omens, roughness, unpleasant taste, evil people, evil things, and all unwholesome factors to be completely eliminated, and we will make them even more peaceful, prosperous, joyful, and free from illness, and all wholesome things will be accomplished.

original: 「時風時雨，寒熱以時，晝夜位分半月一月，時節年歲悉令正行，諸宿星曜日月之次不令失度，泉池陂河皆令滿足，隨有眾生所依住處，瀑水漂溺我皆遮斷不令覆沒。
analyzed: 「時風時雨，寒熱以時，晝夜位分半月一月，時節年歲悉令正行，諸宿星曜日月之次不令失度，泉池陂河皆令滿足，隨有眾生所依住處，瀑水漂溺我皆遮斷不令覆沒。
translated: The wind and rain will be timely, the cold and heat will be moderate, the day and night, the half-month, the month, the seasons, and the years will all be regular, the movements of the stars, sun, moon, and planets will not be disordered, the springs, ponds, marshes, and rivers will all be full, and for all the beings who depend on these places, the rushing waters will be blocked and prevented from flooding.

original: 我等於彼國邑聚落利眾生故，所有枝葉華果根莖諸穀藥味，悉當肥膩色相鮮澤美味滋多，財穀藥味衣服莊嚴諸資具等，令諸眾生悉當具足無所減少。
analyzed: 我等於彼國邑聚落利眾生故，所有枝葉華果根莖諸穀藥味，悉當肥膩色相鮮澤美味滋多，財穀藥味衣服莊嚴諸資具等，令諸眾生悉當具足無所減少。
translated: For the sake of benefiting sentient beings in those countries, villages, and towns, we will cause all branches, leaves, flowers, fruits, roots, stems, grains, and medicinal flavors to be plump, glossy, and have abundant delicious flavors. We will cause sentient beings to be fully endowed with wealth, grains, medicinal flavors, clothing, adornments, and all necessary provisions, without any lack.

original: 「彼諸眾生求善根心離諸惡業，勝福德聚，及彼壽命悉令成就。
analyzed: 「彼諸眾生求善根心離諸惡業，勝福德聚，及彼壽命悉令成就。
translated: Those sentient beings who seek the mind of wholesome roots and are free from evil karma, their superior merits and virtues, and their lifespans, we will cause them all to be accomplished.

original: 所有聚落國土，以此一切諸佛之所擁護陀羅尼法門開示，乃至書寫經卷安置家中，若讀若誦恭敬供養，於置經處。
analyzed: 所有聚落國土，以此一切諸佛之所擁護陀羅尼法門開示，乃至書寫經卷安置家中，若讀若誦恭敬供養，於置經處。
translated: All villages and countries, with this Dharma door of the dhāraṇī that is protected by all Buddhas, will be revealed, and even if the sūtra is written down and placed in the home, if it is read, recited, and respectfully offered to, in the place where the sūtra is placed,

original: 若有剎利灌頂之王，我當擁護供給所須令無所乏，所無利益當為彼等而除斷之，所有利益當為彼等隨而與之。
